description:
Wedding planning can be stressful for a number of reasons - but money doesn't have to be one of them. In this course I will show you how you can have the wedding you want with a budget you can afford.  In this course you will learn how to:

  • Get clear on your must-haves: define what's really important to you so you can stay on track with your wedding plans (and budget!)
  • 40 Practical Actions you can take to Save Money: implementing a handful of these strategies could save you thousands!
  • Stop wasting money: Refocus on the real meaning of your wedding day so you don't waste money on things you don't want or need.


1 in 3 couples overspend on their wedding, I want to make sure you are not one of them.
title: How to Plan a Wedding - Budget Saving Secrets
